name: Raceless Space Race
description:
This was supposed to be a turned based race game. But guess what! Space is so beautiful we made it into an exploration game. Enjoy the scenery like never before with Raceless Space Race.

Controls:
Select direction of flight with left mouse button.
Rotate camera with right mouse button and move it with WSAD and EQ.
Return camera to your spaceship with spacebar.
Have fun!

Made by three people, credit to Aqaba and Ramix -> https://brody1507.itch.io
